rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, P2001, P3002})
For COURSE_CODE IN {3288, 4637} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {PSC1032} Otherwise Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC2222, PSC2232}

description: This subject will cover advanced drug delivery nanotechnologies and parenteral formulations.This will involve three main modules: Drug delivery nanotechnologies micelles emulsions microemulsions liposomes nanosuspensions cyclodextrins lipid based oral formulations Characterization microscopy internal structure surface properties drug encapsulation and release Diagnostics and imaging applications of nanotechnologies imaging modalities nanotechnologies in bioimaging
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
